entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 9:53AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...PATCHY ICE POSSIBLE THROUGH LATE THIS MORNING IN ANCHORAGE NORTH TO THE MATANUSKA VALLEY... As air temperatures dip below freezing this morning, wet surfaces may refreeze to form patches of ice. Use caution when traveling on roadways or walking on wet and/or slick surfaces. Conditions will improve later this morning as temperatures increase.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Anchorage; Matanuska Valley

entry.title: Flood Warning issued November 04 at 8:41AM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .Natural flow on the Saint Johns River near Astor remains hindered due to prolonged northerly winds and tide. entry.cap:areaDesc: Lake; Volusia
